name: Escape Velocity (Timo Heikkinen)
description:
Escape Velocity is a casual, endless game where you pilot your rocket in a straight line through the asteroid field. Use your Boost and Shield abilities to avoid collisions with asteroids, space junk and mines!

How to play:

Hold space: Use Boost. You can boost up your rocket's speed.

Left Alt: Use Shield. Collect shield units to recharge your shields. You can have up to 3 units.

Esc (during play): Menu. Enter the game menu.

The game is a student project. If you enjoy it, please consider donating!

Thank you for playing!
